document_data.name: Grum'shar
document_data.mainbody: '''Grum'shar''' was a [[half-orc]] local chief of the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]] in [[Waterdeep]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Grum'shar managed a hideout for the Xanathar's Thieves' Guild in [[Waterdeep/Sewers|the sewers]] of the [[Dock Ward]].
document_data.History: Around [[1491 DR]], he brutally directed the interrogation of [[Floon Blagmaar]] after the kidnapped young noble arrived in his headquarters, even impressing his guest the [[mind flayer]] [[Nihiloor]]. Heavily tortured, Floon was on the verge of death when adventurers hired by [[Volothamp Geddarm]] found him after defeating Grum'shar.
document_data.Relationships: Grum'shar was in league with a [[gazer]] that protected an entrance to his hideout.
